attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Implement long overdue constitutional reform through the select committee for modernising parliament and the Department for Constitutional Affairs.  Encourage the willing participation of the citizen with institutions which are are fit for the 21st century - Northcote-Trevelyan and Bagehot revisited.

rejection.details: The title of the petition should not be your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
